verses.verse: ה֚וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe אֲרִיאֵ֣ל <S%H740><s%> 'a-ri-'El to Ariel אֲרִיאֵ֔ל <S%H740><s%> 'a-ri-'El, to Ariel קִרְיַ֖ת <S%H7151><s%> kir-Yat the city חָנָ֣ה <S%H2583><s%> cha-Nah dwelt דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; [where] David סְפ֥וּ <S%H5595><s%> se-Fu add שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah ye year עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah to year חַגִּ֥ים <S%H2282><s%> chag-Gim sacrifices יִנְקֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H5362><s%> yin-Ko-fu. let them kill

וַהֲצִיק֖וֹתִי <S%H6693><s%> va-ha-tzi-Ko-ti Yet I will distress לַֽאֲרִיאֵ֑ל <S%H740><s%> la-'a-ri-'El; Ariel וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become תַֽאֲנִיָּה֙ <S%H8386><s%> ta-'a-ni-Yah and there shall be heaviness וַֽאֲנִיָּ֔ה <S%H592><s%> va-'a-ni-Yah, and sorrow וְהָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-ye-tah become לִּ֖י li כַּאֲרִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H740><s%> ka-'a-ri-'El. and it shall be unto me as Ariel

וְחָנִ֥יתִי <S%H2583><s%> ve-cha-Ni-ti And I will camp כַדּ֖וּר <S%H1754><s%> chad-Dur against thee round about עָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich; against וְצַרְתִּ֤י <S%H6696><s%> ve-tzar-Ti and will lay siege עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against מֻצָּ֔ב <S%H4674><s%> mutz-Tzav, against thee with a mount וַהֲקִֽימֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti and I will raise עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against מְצֻרֹֽת׃ <S%H4694><s%> me-tzu-Rot. forts

וְשָׁפַלְתְּ֙ <S%H8213><s%> ve-sha-falT And thou shalt be brought down מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the ground תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-Be-ri, [and] shalt speak וּמֵֽעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> u-me-'a-Far out of the dust תִּשַּׁ֣ח <S%H7817><s%> tish-Shach shall be low אִמְרָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H565><s%> 'im-ra-Tech; and thy speech וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-yah become כְּא֤וֹב <S%H178><s%> ke-'ov shall be as of one that hath a familiar spirit מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the ground קוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lech, and thy voice וּמֵעָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> u-me-'a-Far out of the dust אִמְרָתֵ֥ךְ <S%H565><s%> 'im-ra-Tech and thy speech תְּצַפְצֵֽף׃ <S%H6850><s%> te-tzaf-Tzef. shall whisper

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will become כְּאָבָ֥ק <S%H80><s%> ke-'a-Vak dust דַּ֖ק <S%H1851><s%> dak shall be like small הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon Moreover the multitude זָרָ֑יִךְ <S%H2114><s%> za-Ra-yich; of thy strangers וּכְמֹ֤ץ <S%H4671><s%> u-che-Motz [shall be] as chaff עֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver that passeth away הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon and the multitude עָֽרִיצִ֔ים <S%H6184><s%> 'a-ri-Tzim, of the terrible ones וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will happen לְפֶ֥תַע <S%H6621><s%> le-Fe-ta' yea it shall be at an instant פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <S%H6597><s%> pit-'Om. suddenly

מֵעִ֨ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im From יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts תִּפָּקֵ֔ד <S%H6485><s%> tip-pa-Ked, Thou shalt be visited בְּרַ֥עַם <S%H7482><s%> be-Ra-'am with thunder וּבְרַ֖עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> u-ve-Ra-'ash and with earthquake וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol noise גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; and great סוּפָה֙ <S%H5492><s%> su-Fah with storm וּסְעָרָ֔ה <S%H5591><s%> u-se-'a-Rah, and tempest וְלַ֖הַב <S%H3851><s%> ve-La-hav and the flame אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire אוֹכֵלָֽה׃ <S%H398><s%> o-che-Lah. of devouring

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כַּֽחֲלוֹם֙ <S%H2472><s%> ka-cha-lOm her shall be as a dream חֲז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon vision לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah, of a night הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mOn And the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <S%H6633><s%> hatz-tzoe-'Im that fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֲרִיאֵ֑ל <S%H740><s%> 'a-ri-'El; against Ariel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all צֹבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6633><s%> tzo-Vei-ha war וּמְצֹ֣דָתָ֔הּ <S%H4685><s%> u-me-Tzo-da-Tah, against her and her munition וְהַמְּצִיקִ֖ים <S%H6693><s%> ve-ham-me-tzi-Kim and that distress לָֽהּ׃ Lah.

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher or as when יַחֲלֹ֨ם <S%H2492><s%> ya-cha-Lom [man] dreameth הָרָעֵ֜ב <S%H7457><s%> ha-ra-'Ev It shall even be as when an hungry וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אוֹכֵ֗ל <S%H398><s%> o-Chel, and behold he eateth וְהֵקִיץ֮ <S%H6974><s%> ve-he-Kitz but he awaketh וְרֵיקָ֣ה <S%H7386><s%> ve-rei-Kah is empty נַפְשׁוֹ֒ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho and his soul וְכַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ve-cha-'a-Sher after יַחֲלֹ֤ם <S%H2492><s%> ya-cha-Lom dreameth הַצָּמֵא֙ <S%H6771><s%> hatz-tza-Me a thirsty man וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold שֹׁתֶ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> sho-Teh, and behold he drinketh וְהֵקִיץ֙ <S%H6974><s%> ve-he-Kitz but he awaketh וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold עָיֵ֔ף <S%H5889><s%> 'a-Yef, and behold [he is] faint וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> ve-naf-Sho and his soul שׁוֹקֵקָ֑ה <S%H8264><s%> sho-ke-Kah; hath appetite כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh, become הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> ha-mOn so shall the multitude כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <S%H6633><s%> hatz-tzoe-'Im be that fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har against mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon. Zion ס sa-Mek

הִתְמַהְמְה֣וּ <S%H4102><s%> hit-mah-me-Hu Stay וּתְמָ֔הוּ <S%H8539><s%> u-te-Ma-hu, yourselves and wonder הִשְׁתַּֽעַשְׁע֖וּ <S%H8173><s%> hish-ta-'ash-'U cry ye out וָשֹׁ֑עוּ <S%H8173><s%> va-Sho-'u; and cry שָֽׁכְר֣וּ <S%H7937><s%> sha-che-Ru they are drunken וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin, but not with wine נָע֖וּ <S%H5128><s%> na-'U they stagger וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> she-Char. but not with strong drink

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נָסַ֨ךְ <S%H5258><s%> na-Sach hath poured out עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem over יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach upon you the spirit תַּרְדֵּמָ֔ה <S%H8639><s%> tar-de-Mah, of deep sleep וַיְעַצֵּ֖ם <S%H6105><s%> vay-'atz-Tzem and hath closed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem; your eyes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im the prophets וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Chem and your rulers הַחֹזִ֖ים <S%H2374><s%> ha-cho-Zim the seers כִּסָּֽה׃ <S%H3680><s%> kis-Sah. hath he covered

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become לָכֶ֜ם la-Chem חָז֣וּת <S%H2380><s%> cha-Zut And the vision הַכֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol, the entire כְּדִבְרֵי֮ <S%H1697><s%> ke-div-Rei of all is become unto you as the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer of a book הֶֽחָתוּם֒ <S%H2856><s%> he-cha-Tum that is sealed אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Nu which [men] deliver אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' to one that is learned; הַסֵּפֶר has-se-fer כסֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer book קלֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> ke-Ra Read נָא־ <S%H4994><s%> na- Please זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh; this וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אוּכַ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal, I cannot כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חָת֖וּם <S%H2856><s%> cha-Tum for it [is] sealed הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְנִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-nit-Tan is delivered הַסֵּ֗פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer, And the book עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- cannot יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' I am not learned סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer the book לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> ke-Ra Read נָא־ <S%H4994><s%> na- Please זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh; this וְאָמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo cannot יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti acknowledge סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer. the book ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, Wherefore the Lord יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Forasmuch כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִגַּשׁ֙ <S%H5066><s%> nig-Gash draw near הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am as this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this בְּפִ֤יו <S%H6310><s%> be-Fiv [me] with their mouth וּבִשְׂפָתָיו֙ <S%H8193><s%> u-vis-fa-Tav and with their lips כִּבְּד֔וּנִי <S%H3513><s%> kib-be-Du-ni, do honour וְלִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bo their heart רִחַ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> ri-Chak far מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi consists יִרְאָתָם֙ <S%H3373><s%> yir-'a-Tam afraid אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, מִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vat by the precept אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim he מְלֻמָּדָֽה׃ <S%H3925><s%> me-lum-ma-Dah. toward me is taught

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold יוֹסִ֛ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif Therefore behold I will proceed לְהַפְלִ֥יא <S%H6381><s%> le-haf-Li to do a marvellous work אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'om- among this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this הַפְלֵ֣א <S%H6381><s%> haf-Le [even] a marvellous work וָפֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> va-Fe-le; and a wonder וְאָֽבְדָה֙ <S%H6><s%> ve-'a-ve-Dah [men] shall perish חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> cha-che-Mat for the wisdom חֲכָמָ֔יו <S%H2450><s%> cha-cha-Mav, of their wise וּבִינַ֥ת <S%H998><s%> u-vi-Nat and the understanding נְבֹנָ֖יו <S%H995><s%> ne-vo-Nav of their prudent תִּסְתַּתָּֽר׃ <S%H5641><s%> tis-tat-Tar. [men] shall be hid ס sa-Mek

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe הַמַּעֲמִיקִ֥ים <S%H6009><s%> ham-ma-'a-mi-Kim unto them that seek deep מֵֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD לַסְתִּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> las-Tir to hide עֵצָ֑ה <S%H6098><s%> 'e-Tzah; their counsel וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah are in בְמַחְשָׁךְ֙ <S%H4285><s%> ve-mach-shoCh are in the dark מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-sei-Hem, and their works וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they say מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who רֹאֵ֖נוּ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'E-nu Who seeth וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi Who יוֹדְעֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> yod-'E-nu. us;and who knoweth

הַ֨פְכְּכֶ֔ם <S%H2017><s%> haf-ke-Chem, Surely your turning of things upside down אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo כְּחֹ֥מֶר <S%H2563><s%> ke-Cho-mer clay הַיֹּצֵ֖ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer as the potter's יֵֽחָשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> ye-cha-Shev; shall be esteemed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- would יֹאמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar say מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh for shall the work לְעֹשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> le-'o-Se-hu of him that made לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo has no עָשָׂ֔נִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sa-ni, it He made וְיֵ֛צֶר <S%H3336><s%> ve-Ye-tzer me not;or shall the thing framed אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar say לְיוֹצְר֖וֹ <S%H3335><s%> le-yotz-Ro of him that framed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo has no הֵבִֽין׃ <S%H995><s%> he-Vin. it He had no understanding
